title: Brazil : most valuable soccer players at the 2018 FIFA World Cup
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
Month Neymar has the highest Market value in million euros and Ederson has the lowest Market value in million euros.
There is a difference of 130.0 between the maximum Month Neymar and minimum Month Ederson.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market value in million euros for 10 number of Months.
The Market value in million euros is highest at Month Neymar and lowest at Month Ederson.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
Month Neymar has the highest Market value in million euros and Ederson has the lowest Market value in million euros.
There is a difference of 130.0 between the maximum Month Neymar and minimum Month Ederson.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is highest at Month Neymar and lowest at Month Ederson.
Second maximum Market value in million euros is found at Month Philippe Coutinho.
The highest Month Neymar has 130.0 more Market value in million euros than the lowest Month Ederson.
Month Neymar is higher than any other Months with value 180.0, followed by Philippe Coutinho, and Gabriel Jesus. Down to Month Ederson with the lowest value 50.0.
Over the past 10 Months, the Market value in million euros has lowered.
Month Casemiro, Marcelo, and Alisson have a similar Market value in million euros that is 60.0.
Considered together, the average Market value in million euros in all 10 Months is roughly 78.0.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 780.0.
